content:
AdamInstance Class

Definition

The AdamInstance class represents an AD LDS instance server.

In this Article

public class AdamInstance : System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer
Inheritance
Object
System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer
AdamInstance

Inherited Members

Dispose()
GetDirectoryEntry()
MoveToAnotherSite(String)
Name
Partitions
ToString()
Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Remarks

Note

The AdamInstance class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

Properties

ConfigurationSet

Gets the ConfigurationSet object for this AD LDS instance.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet ConfigurationSet { get; }
Value
ConfigurationSet

The ConfigurationSet object for this AdamInstance object.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

DefaultPartition

Gets or sets the default partition that this AD LDS instance serves.

public string DefaultPartition { get; set; }
Value
String

A String that contains the distinguished name of the default partition that this AD LDS instance serves. If the default partition is not set, this will return null.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentException

The partition name is not in a valid distinguished name format, or the AD LDS instance does not serve this partition. Applies to set only.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

HostName

Gets the host name of the computer that hosts this AD LDS instance.

public string HostName { get; }
Value
String

A String that contains the computer host name.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

InboundConnections

Gets the inbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection InboundConnections { get; }
Value
ReplicationConnectionCollection

A ReplicationConnectionCollection object that contains the inbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

IPAddress

Gets the IP address of the computer that hosts this AD LDS instance.

public override string IPAddress { get; }
Value
String

A String that contains the IP address of the computer that hosts this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

LdapPort

Gets the LDAP port number of this AD LDS instance.

public int LdapPort { get; }
Value
Int32

A Int32 value that contains the LDAP port number of this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

OutboundConnections

Gets the outbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection OutboundConnections { get; }
Value
ReplicationConnectionCollection

A ReplicationConnectionCollection object that contains the outbound replication connections for this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Roles

Gets the roles that this AD LDS instance holds.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection Roles { get; }
Value
AdamRoleCollection

A AdamRoleCollection object that contains AdamRole members that indicate the roles that this AD LDS instance serves.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SiteName

Gets the name of the site of which this AD LDS instance is a member.

public override string SiteName { get; }
Value
String

A String that contains the name of the site of which this AD LDS instance is a member.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SslPort

Gets the SSL port number of this AD LDS instance.

public int SslPort { get; }
Value
Int32

A Int32 value that contains the SSL port number of this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SyncFromAllServersCallback

Gets or sets the synchronization delegate for this AD LDS instance.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback SyncFromAllServersCallback { get; set; }
Value
SyncUpdateCallback

A SyncUpdateCallback delegate that this AD LDS instance will use for synchronization notifications.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

Methods

CheckReplicationConsistency()

Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

public override void CheckReplicationConsistency ();
Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Remarks

For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the AdamInstance object and, optionally, releases managed resources.

protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

A Boolean value that determines if the managed resources should be released. true if the managed resources should be released; false if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

Finalize()

Overrides the stem.Object.Finalize* method.

~AdamInstance ();

FindAll(DirectoryContext,String)

Finds all AD LDS instances in the specified context that host the specified partition.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this context must be an AD LDS configuration set.

partitionName
String

A String that contains the name of the partition to search for AD LDS instances.

Returns
AdamInstanceCollection

A AdamInstanceCollection that contains the AD LDS instances that are found by the search.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

The context or partitionName parameter is not valid.

ArgumentNullException

The context or partitionName parameter is null.

ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

No AD LDS instance was found.

FindOne(DirectoryContext,String)

Finds a single AD LDS instance in the specified context that hosts the specified partition.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string partitionName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this context must be an AD LDS configuration set.

partitionName
String

A String that contains the name of the partition to search for an AD LDS instance.

Returns
AdamInstance

A AdamInstance object that represents the AD LDS instance that is found by the search.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

No AD LDS instance was found.

ArgumentException

The context or partitionName parameter is not valid.

ArgumentNullException

The context or partitionName parameter is null.

GetAdamInstance(DirectoryContext)

Returns an AD LDS instance for a specified context.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance GetAdamInstance (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object. The target of the context must be an AD LDS instance.

Returns
AdamInstance

An AdamInstance object that refers to the AD LDS instance that is found.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

A connection to the target that was specified in the context parameter could not be made.

ArgumentNullException

The context parameter is null.

ArgumentException

The context parameter is not valid.

Remarks

Note

The GetAdamInstance method refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

GetAllReplicationNeighbors()

Returns the replication neighbors for this AD LDS instance.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetAllReplicationNeighbors ();
Returns
ReplicationNeighborCollection

A ReplicationNeighborCollection object that contains the replication neighbors for this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationConnectionFailures()

Returns a list of replication connection failures that are recorded by this AD LDS instance.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationFailureCollection GetReplicationConnectionFailures ();
Returns
ReplicationFailureCollection

A ReplicationFailureCollection object that contains the replication connection failures that are recorded by this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationCursors(String)

Returns the replication cursor information for a specified partition.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationCursorCollection GetReplicationCursors (string partition);
partition
String

A String that contains the distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication cursor information.

Returns
ReplicationCursorCollection

A ReplicationCursorCollection object that contains the replication cursor information.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

The partition parameter is null.

ArgumentException

The partition parameter is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationMetadata(String)

Returns the replication metadata for a specific Active Directory Domain Services object.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata GetReplicationMetadata (string objectPath);
objectPath
String

A String that contains the path to the Active Directory Domain Services object for which to retrieve the replication metadata.

Returns
ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata

A ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata object that contains the replication cursor information.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

objectPath is null.

ArgumentException

objectPath is not valid.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

GetReplicationNeighbors(String)

Returns the replication neighbors for a specified partition.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetReplicationNeighbors (string partition);
partition
String

A String that contains the distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication neighbors.

Returns
ReplicationNeighborCollection

A ReplicationNeighborCollection object that contains the replication neighbors for this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

The partition parameter is null.

ArgumentException

The partition parameter is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationOperationInformation()

Returns the current and pending replication operations for this AD LDS instance.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationOperationInformation GetReplicationOperationInformation ();
Returns
ReplicationOperationInformation

A ReplicationOperationInformation object that contains the current and pending replications operations.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Save()

Commits changes to the AdamInstance object to the underlying directory store.

public void Save ();
Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SeizeRoleOwnership(AdamRole)

Seizes ownership of the specified role.

public void SeizeRoleOwnership (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole role);
role
AdamRole

One of the AdamRole members that specifies which role the AD LDS instance should take ownership of.

Exceptions
InvalidEnumArgumentException

The role parameter is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SyncReplicaFromAllServers(String,SyncFromAllServersOptions)

Synchronizes the specified partition with all other domain controllers.

public override void SyncReplicaFromAllServers (string partition, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions options);
partition
String

A String that contains the distinguished name of the partition of the domain controller to synchronize.

options
SyncFromAllServersOptions

A combination of one of more of the SyncFromAllServersOptions members.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

The partition parameter is null.

ArgumentException

The partition parameter is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

SyncFromAllServersOperationException

An error occurred in the synchronization operation.

SyncReplicaFromServer(String,String)

Synchronizes the specified partition with the specified domain controller.

public override void SyncReplicaFromServer (string partition, string sourceServer);
partition
String

A String that contains the distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.

sourceServer
String

A String that contains the name of the server with which to synchronize.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

The partition or sourceServer parameter is null.

ArgumentException

The partition or sourceServer parameter is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

TransferRoleOwnership(AdamRole)

Transfers the specified role to this AD LDS instance.

public void TransferRoleOwnership (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole role);
role
AdamRole

One of the AdamRole members that specifies which role should be transferred to this AD LDS instance.

Exceptions
InvalidEnumArgumentException

The role parameter is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors(String)

Begins a synchronization of the specified partition.

public override void TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors (string partition);
partition
String

A String that contains the distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

The partition parameter is null.

ArgumentException

The partition is parameter not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
